name: Curieuse Mangroves: Root Letters
scene: 4 crab mounds, 5 arches, 1 tortoise bell. Roots form the letter I.
riddle: To read the forest, climb one branch higher.

renderSpec.prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of 4 crab mounds, 5 arches, 1 tortoise bell. Roots form the letter I.. mangrove_root_cathedral_letter_formation with twisted_root_mud_texture. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: crab_mound_patterns, tortoise_shell_bell. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene.
